# Comments

```vue
<template>
  <p>Hello, World!</p>
</template>
```

<!-- no-vue-component -->

```vue
<template>
  <p>Hello, World!</p>
</template>
```

```js
export default {
  template: '<p>Hello, World!</p>',
};
```

<!-- vue-component -->

```js
export default {
  template: '<p>Hello, World!</p>',
};
```
